title: Waterford Round Ring Holder
features: Timeless crystal ring holder by Waterford
Crafted of lead crystal - hand wash only
Excellent gift for weddings, engagements, anniversaries and Valentine's Day
Spike for holding rings and round tray for earrings or other jewelery
description: The Round Ring Holer has a starburst cut on the underside that shows through tht ecrystal creating a beautiful effect. Along the outside are straight cuts that add texture and a beautiful design to the piece. This is a great piece for any vanity to hold precious ring or small pieces of jewelry.
